trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when you try to access a printer using printer settings that are not valid.
trans-unit.target: 表示在嘗試使用無效的印表機設定來存取印表機時擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The most common cause of printer settings that are not valid is referencing a printer that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 無效的印表機設定的最常見的原因參考不存在的印表機。

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需列印的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空間的概觀。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.InvalidPrinterException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.InvalidPrinterException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" /> that specifies the settings for a printer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />，指定印表機的設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.InvalidPrinterException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.InvalidPrinterException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含所擲回之例外狀況的相關序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.InvalidPrinterException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.InvalidPrinterException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="info" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The class name is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="P:System.Exception.HResult" /> is 0.
trans-unit.target: 類別名稱為 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Exception.HResult" /> 為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含所擲回之例外狀況的相關序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Overridden.
trans-unit.target: 被覆寫。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用例外狀況的相關資訊來設定 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.InvalidPrinterException.GetObjectData%2A> method sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the exception object data targeted for serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.InvalidPrinterException.GetObjectData%2A>方法會設定<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>的目標為序列化的所有例外狀況物件資料。

trans-unit.source: During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: 在還原序列化期間，從在資料流上傳輸的 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> 重新組成例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="info" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 進行序列化與還原序列化。

trans-unit.source: For more information see: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SerializationFormatter" />
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SerializationFormatter" />
